title: Setup Convex Database Schema
objective: Create real-time database schema for kanban boards and tasks
requirements: Define boards table with name, createdAt, createdBy
Define tasks table with all required fields
Add indexes for by_board and by_column queries
acceptanceCriteria: Schema file compiles without TypeScript errors
Convex accepts and deploys the schema
Generated types are accessible from _generated folder
testCommand: npx convex dev && npm run typecheck
successIndicator: Functions pushed successfully with no type errors
